remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命中的测试位置不在、属性将为`null`。If the hit test location is not on a , the property will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例中，创建一个包含的 Windows 窗体名为`treeView1`，并用其填充与多个级别的节点。To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`, and populate it with several levels of nodes. 将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并将关联事件`treeView1`与`treeView1_MouseDown`方法。Paste the following code into a form, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method.
